taskGroup.name: Data Exploration Perspective
taskGroup.intro: This perspective allows you to explore your data

taskGroup.name: Introduction
taskGroup.intro: This introduction will show you how to use some basic features of the data exploration, DExplore, perspective.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have completed the tutorial and now know how to use the data exploration perspective.

task.name: Accessing Your Data
task.intro: Access to your data can be achieved in a variety of methods. This tutorial explains those methods.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have successfully open a data file in the editor area.

task.name: Understanding the File Editors
task.intro: The data file is presented in the editor area in different manners according to their format type. This tutorial explains those types.
task.onCompletion: Now, select an item to inspect and read the next tutorial.

task.name: Inspecting Your Data
task.intro: After selecting an item to inspect, choose how to examine or visualize it with the Dataset Inspector.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have visualized your data. Play around further to familiarise yourself with the controls that manipulate the data. Understand the nature of multi-dimensional datasets.

taskGroup.name: Advanced Use
taskGroup.intro: This tutorial will show you how to use advanced features of the data exploration, DExplore, perspective.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have completed the tutorial and now know how to expertly use the data exploration perspective.

task.name: Accessing Multiple Files In Your Data
task.intro: This tutorial explains how to open multiple files to compare equivalent datasets.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have successfully open a set of files in the editor area.
